name: Bouncy Boomerang
description:
A short puzzle/action game. Bounce a boomerang off the walls to defeat enemies and solve puzzles!

Controls:

[WASD] or arrows to move around.
Use [Space] while moving to throw and catch.
You need to be moving in the direction of the throw!
You can only activate switches and hit enemies with your boomerang.
Make sure you have your boomerang when you go to the exit.

Created for Weekly Game Jam - Week 195
And for a CS30 Final Assessment

Credits

Made with Pygame
Music: Bounce by Metre
Tileset: Pixel_Poem Dungeon Tileset and
Castle Brick [Connecting Tileset]
Font: Disposable Droid BB
